sermons.title: (Godly Home) Part 15 - Father - the Anointed Teacher
sermons.description: Brother Denny exhorts fathers in their God-appointed role to "live on the edge of the impossible" by trusting God to work through them.  He shares on six holy qualities a father must have to effectively teach his children.  Kenaston strongly advocates making family devotions a top priority and shares from personal experience how the Lord has wrought godliness in his home through adopting that.

sermons.title: (Guidelines) Meditate on the Bible
sermons.description: The Word of God is to be before His children continually. We should write the word on our doorposts, and the gates of our homes, and everywhere we live. McGee recalls a conversation he had with an advertising executive from Coca Cola about how serious the world is in reinforcing its message everywhere. In practical ways he suggests using car travel time, or bedtime for additional Bible time.

sermons.title: 5. Are there more Gods than one?
56 Principle 52- The Practice of Teaching Children
sermons.description: All churches have been bulldozed in North Korea except for a few show churches in the main capital of North Korea. Christians practice their faith in secrecy and constant danger. Religious prisoners are often subjected to harsher treatment and given the most dangerous tasks, all to force them to renounce their faith. When they refuse, they have often been tortured to death. Likewise their children are sentenced to hard labor and starved to death.

sermons.title: Desert Survival Series Pt 31- Moses The Servant of God
New Life Baptist Church - Part 5
sermons.description: This is an important message for any father who desires to bring his children up in the ways of the Lord. Encouraging, yet challenging, Paul advises the listener to examine the Word of God and what it says about biblical manhood and how it applys to being a father. In this way, a man through his own example of Christ likeness can raise his son in what it means to walk as a godly man.

sermons.title: The One Whom My Soul Loves
sermons.description: Have you found the one that your soul loves? Do you love Him more than your parents, your pastor or your counselor. When satan tempted the Lord, Jesus answered Him from Godâ€™s Word. He first answered him that man shall not live by bread alone but by every word that proceeds from the mouth of God. He also answered that you shall worship the Lord your God and Him alone you shall serve. And also that you shall not tempt the Lord your God (Matt 4). We must also find daily bread from Him; that we partake of Him that He brings that daily beauty and sweetness into our lives.
